snippet: The warning came after Iran’s government confirmed reports that 11 Iranian citizens, whom it described as pilgrims, had been kidnapped last week while visiting Syria.
lead_paragraph: The warning came after Iran’s government confirmed reports that 11 Iranian citizens, whom it described as pilgrims, had been kidnapped last week while visiting Syria.

headline.seo: Iran Warns Its Citizens to Avoid Bus Trips to Syria
